GSP33rams11pu:10: atyantātīndriyatvena pratyakṣādipramāṇāviṣayatayā brahmaṇaś śāstraikapramāṇakatvād uktasvarūpaṃ brahma yato vā imāni bhūtānītyādivākyaṃ bodhayaty evetyarthaḥ //
GSP33rams11pu:16: tad dhi dvividham indriyasaṃbhavaṃ yogasaṃbhavaṃ ceti /
GSP33rams11pu:17: indriyasaṃbhavaṃ ca bāhyasaṃbhavam āntarasaṃbhavaṃ ceti dvividhā /
GSP33rams11pu:22: bhāvanāprakarṣaparyantajanmanas tasya viśadāvabhāsatve 'pi pūrvānubhūtaviṣayasmṛtimātratvān na prāmāṇyam iti kutaḥ pratyakṣatā ?
GSP33rams11pu:39: kiṃ ca, śarīrāvayavinaḥ svāvayavasamavetatārūpā sthitir avayavasaṃśleṣavyatirekeṇa na cetanam apekṣate /
GSP33rams11pu:40: prāṇanalakṣaṇā tu sthitiḥ pakṣatvābhimate kṣitijaladhimahīdharādau na saṃbhavatīti pakṣasapakṣānugatām ekarūpāṃ sthitiṃ nopalabhāmahe /
GSP33rams11pu:44: kiṃ ca, ubhayavādisiddhānāṃ jīvānām eva lāghavena kartṛtvābhyupagamo yuktaḥ /
GSP33rams11pu:47: yathedānīṃ pṛthivyādayo yāgādayaś ca pratyakṣam īkṣyante /
GSP33rams11pu:53: na hi kulālādayaḥ kāryopakaraṇabhūtadaṇḍacakrādivat tacchaktim api sākṣātkṛtya ghaṭamaṇikādikāryam ārabhante /
GSP33rams11pu:56: kiṃ ca, yacchakyakriyaṃ śakyopādānādivijñānaṃ ca tad eva tadabhijñakartṛkaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP33rams11pu:57: mahīmahīdharamahārṇavādi tv aśakyakriyam aśakyopādānādivijñānaṃ ceti na cetanakartṛkam /
GSP33rams11pu:58: ato ghaṭamaṇikādi sajātīyaśakyakriyaśakyopādānādivijñānavastugatam eva kāryatvaṃ buddhimankartṛpūrvakatvasādhane prabhavati /
GSP33rams11pu:59: kiṃ ca, ghaṭādikāryam anīśvareṇālpajñānaśaktinā saśarīreṇa parigrahavatānāptakāmena
GSP33rams11pu:60: nirmitaṃ dṛṣṭam iti tathāvidham eva cetanaṃ kartāraṃ sādhayann ayaṃ kāryatvahetus
GSP33rams11pu:63: liṅgini pramāṇāntaragocare liṅgabalopasthāpitā viparītaviśeṣās tatpramāṇapratihatagatayo nivartante /
GSP33rams11pu:64: iha tu sakaletarapramāṇāviṣaye liṅgini nikhilanirmāṇacature anvayavyatirekāvagatāvinābhāvaniyamā dharmās sarva evāviśeṣeṇa prasajyante;
GSP33rams11pu:66: ata āgamād ṛte katham īśvaras setsyati ?
GSP33rams11pu:67: atrāhuḥ / sāvayavatvād eva jagataḥ kāryatvaṃ na pratyākhyātuṃ śakyate /
GSP33rams11pu:68: bhavanti ca prayogāḥ vivādādhyāsitaṃ bhūbhūdharādi kāryam,
GSP33rams11pu:76: sāvayaveṣu dravyeṣu idam eva kriyate netarad iti kāryatvasya niyāmakaṃ sāvayavatvātireki rūpāntaraṃ nopalabhāmahe /
GSP33rams11pu:77: kāryatvapratiniyataṃ śakyakriyatvaṃ śakyopādānādivijñānatvaṃ copalabhyata iti cen na;
GSP33rams11pu:78: kāryatvenānumate 'pi viṣaye jñānaśaktī kāryānumeye ity anyatrāpi sāvayavatvādinā kāryatvaṃ jñātam iti te ca pratipanne eveti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ
GSP33rams11pu:80: vicitrasanniveśaṃ narendrabhavanam ālokya avayavasanniveṣaviśeṣeṇa tasya kāryatvaṃ niścitya tadānīm eva kartus tajjñānaśaktivaicitryam anuminoti
GSP33rams11pu:81: atas tanubhuvanādeḥ kāryatve siddhe sarvasākṣātkāratannirmāṇādinipuṇaḥ kvacit puruṣaviśeṣas sidhyaty eva /
GSP33rams11pu:82: kiṃ ca sarvacetanānāṃ dharmādharmanimitte 'pi sukhaduḥkhopabhoge cetanānadhiṣṭhitayos
GSP33rams11pu:83: tayor acetanayoḥ phalahetutvānupapattes sarvakarmānuguṇasarvaphalapradānacaturaḥ kaścid āstheyaḥ;
GSP33rams11pu:85: bījāṅkuarādeḥ pakṣāntarbhāvena tair vyabhicārāpādanaṃ śrotriyavetālānām anabhijñatāvijṛmbhitam /
GSP33rams11pu:86: tata eva sukhādibhir vyabhicāravacanam api tathaiva /
GSP33rams11pu:96: sapakṣe sahadṛṣṭānāṃ sarveṣāṃ kāryasyāhetubhūtānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ liṅginy aprāpteḥ /
GSP33rams11pu:98: kenacit kiṃcit kriyamāṇaṃ svotpattaye kartus svanirmāṇasāmarthyaṃ svopādānopakaraṇajñānaṃ cāpekṣate;
GSP33rams11pu:101: svanirmāṇasāmarthyasvopādānopakaraṇajñānābhyām eva svotpattāv upapannāyāṃ saṃbandhitayā darśanamātreṇākiṃcitkarasyārthāntarājñānādeḥ hetutvakalpanāyogād iti /
GSP33rams11pu:103: na hi kulālādiḥ kriyamāṇavyatiriktaṃ kim api na jānāti /
GSP33rams11pu:105: sarveṣu kartṛṣu tattadajñānāśaktyaniyamena sarveṣām ajñānādīnāṃ vyabhicārāt / ataḥ
GSP33rams11pu:106: kāryatvasyāsādhakānām anīśvaratvādīnāṃ liṅginy apratītir iti na viparītasādhanatvam /
GSP33rams11pu:107: kulālādīnāṃ daṇḍacakrādyadhiṣṭhānaṃ śarīradvāreṇaiva dṛṣṭam iti jagadupādānopakaraṇādhiṣṭhānam īśvarasyāśarīrasyānupapannam iti cen na;
GSP33rams11pu:109: katham aśarīrasya parapravartanarūpas saṃkalpa iti cet;
GSP33rams11pu:122: ataḥ pramāṇāntarāvaseyatvād brahmaṇo naitadvākyaṃ brahma pratipādayati /
GSP33rams11pu:123: kiṃ ca, atyantabhinnayor eva mṛddravyakulālayor nimittopādānatvadarśanena ākāśāder
GSP33rams11pu:124: niravayavadravyasya kāryatvānupapattyā ca naikam eva brahma kṛtsnasya jagato nimittam
GSP33rams11pu:126: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ yathoktalakṣaṇaṃ brahma janmādivākyaṃ bodhayaty eva /
GSP33rams11pu:128: yad uktaṃ sāvayavatvādinā kāryaṃ sarvaṃ jagat,
GSP33rams11pu:129: kāryaṃ ca taducitakartṛviśeṣapūrvakaṃ dṛṣṭam iti nikhilajagannirmāṇatadupādānopakaraṇavedanacaturaḥ kaścid anumeya iti;
GSP33rams11pu:131: mahīmahārṇavādīnāṃ kāryatve 'pi ekadaivaikenaiva nirmitā ity atra pramāṇābhāvāt /
GSP33rams11pu:132: na caikasya ghaṭasyeva sarveṣām ekaṃ kāryatvam,
GSP33rams11pu:135: na ca kṣetrajñānāṃ vicitrajagannirmāṇaśaktyā kāryatvabalena tadatiriktakalpanāyām anekakalpanānupapatteś ca ekaḥ kartā bhavitum arhatīti;
GSP33rams11pu:139: na ca yugapat sarvotpattis sarvocchittiś ca pramāṇapadavīm adhirohataḥ; adarśanāt,
GSP33rams11pu:141: kāryatvena sarvotpattivināśayoḥ kalpyamānayoḥ darśanānuguṇyena kalpanāyāṃ virodhābhāvāc ca /
GSP33rams11pu:147: sārvajñyasarvaśaktiyuktasya kasyacid ekasya sādhakam idaṃ kāryatvaṃ kiṃ yugamadutpadyamānasarvavastugatam ?
GSP33rams11pu:155: api ca sarveṣāṃ kāryāṇāṃ śarīrādīnāṃ ca sattvādiguṇakāryarūpasukhādyanvayadarśanena sattvādimūlatvam avaśyāśrayaṇīyam /
GSP33rams11pu:158: puruṣasya ca tadyogaḥ karmamūlaḥ iti kāryaviśeṣārambhāyaiva jñānaśaktivat kartuḥ karmasaṃbandhaḥ kāryahetutvenaivāvaśyāśrayanīyaḥ;
GSP33rams11pu:160: icchāyāḥ kāryārambhahetutve 'pi viṣayaviśeṣaviśeṣitāyās tasyās sattvāimūlakatvena karmasaṃbandho 'varjanīyaḥ / ataḥ
GSP33rams11pu:175: api ca, kim īśvaras saśarīro 'śarīro vā kāryaṃ karoti ?
GSP33rams11pu:183: sāvayavasya tasya nityatve jagato 'pi nityatvāvirodhād īśvarāsiddheḥ /
GSP33rams11pu:186: svayam eva hetur iti cen na;
GSP33rams11pu:188: anyena śarīreṇa saśarīra iti cen na;
GSP33rams11pu:193: kāryaṃ jagad icchāmātravyāpārakartṛkam ity ucyamāne pakṣasyāprasiddhaviśeṣaṇatvam,
GSP33rams11pu:195: ato darśanānuguṇyeneśvarānumānaṃ darśanānuguṇyaparāhatam iti śāstraikapramāṇakaḥ parabrahmabhūtas sarveśvaraḥ puruṣottamaḥ /
GSP33rams11pu:198: yat tu nimittopādānayor aikyam ākāśāder niravayavadravyasya kāryatvaṃ cānupalabdham aśakyapratipādanam ity uktam,
GSP33rams11pu:199: tad apy aviruddham iti prakṛtiś ca pratijñādṛṣṭāntānuparodhāt,
GSP33rams11pu:201: ataḥ pramāṇāntarāgocaratvena śāstraikaviṣayatvād yato vā imāni bhūtānīti vākyam uktalakṣaṇaṃ brahma pratipādayatīti siddham //1,1.3//
